column4: Hi guys, just installed a fresh copy of dapper drake flight 6 on my 64bit amd computer, and I've come across some bugs, so I've started to report them, but I am confused at the input form. It states "Path of sendmail" I'm not sure what to put in there
did you install and set up sendmail?
please join #ubuntu+1 with me and i will help you
Nope, I've just installed it, not setup anything.
